titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1996, the duty on certain machinery.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 2/10/1994--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1995, the duty on: (1) roto textile spinning machinery; (2) rotary screen print machinery; (3) airjet weaving machines for weaving fabrics of a width exceeding 30 cm; and (4) projectile looms for weaving fabrics of a width exceeding 30 cm.
